price: (35) And [that is so] those who dispute concerning Our signs may know that for them there is no place of escape.
arabic: وَيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayaʿlama alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣin
